DataElement.preferredName: Stage II Ovarian Cancer Diagnosis Ind-3b
DataElement.preferredDefinition: indicator of yes/no/not applicable related to invasive cancer more extensive than stage I, usually involving local lymph nodes without spread to distant anatomic sites from one of the paired female reproductive glands containing the ova or germ cells being diagnosed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to invasive cancer more extensive than stage I, usually involving local lymph nodes without spread to distant anatomic sites from one of the paired female reproductive glands containing the ova or germ cells being diagnosed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Stage II includes: T2, N0, M0.  T2: Tumor involves one or both ovaries with pelvic extension and/or implants.  N0: No regional lymph node metastasis.  M0: No distant metastasis. (AJCC 6th ed.) - 2003

Concepts.longName: Stage II Ovarian Cancer AJCC v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Stage II includes: T2, N0, M0.  T2: Tumor involves one or both ovaries with pelvic extension and/or implants.  N0: No regional lymph node metastasis.  M0: No distant metastasis. (AJCC 6th and 7th eds.)

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have documen
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have documentation of at least stage II or extraovarian diseases acquiring via imaging or surgery (without attempt at cytoreduction)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have documentation of at least stage II disease acquired via imaging or surgery (without attempt at cytoreduction)
